☰ Document Outline

The Bhīma Svarga

edited by Aditia Gunawan

Current Version: draft, 2022-04-27Z
Still in progress – do not quote without permission.
  • Witnesses
  • Metadata

List of Witnesses

  • A: Perpustakaan Nasional Republik Indonesia, Jakarta, L 455
    • Content:
      • Colophon:
        • °iti tucap ucapan bima svaṙga
      • Physical Description:
        • Hand Description:

          1

        • History: Ce manuscrit est parmi les rares exemples de manuscrits gebang originaires de la région des volcans Merapi et Merbabu du centre de Java.
      • B: Perpustakaan Nasional Republik Indonesia, Jakarta, L 623
        • Content:
          • Colophon:
            • °itiḥ kahuvusan·niṁ putakabima °ḷpas· harani :ka, sam·map·ta sam·pun· sinura- ta_ l. sinurat iṅ vulan· kasa, saṅ anurat· panada°an· sakapat· pun·, °әñcu nu ṅaheraṁ bukit· cikuray· samapun
          • Physical Description:
          • C: Ermitage de Ciburuy, Garut,
            • Physical Description:
            • Q: Gedong Kirtya, Bali, Bali 1460
              • Content:
                • Colophon:
                  • iti tatva bima svarga, lulukatan parisamapta
                • Physical Description:
                  • History: Ce manuscrit a été acquis par le Gedong Kirtya le 19 mars 1938. Il comporte une note attachée dans le ma- nuscrit qui mentionne qu’il s’agit d’une copie d’un manuscrit appartenant à Anak Agoeng Anom Rai du Puri Denpasar (Bangli) copiée par I Ketut Kad- jeng.
                • R: Bali, HKS 7507
                  • Content:
                    • Colophon:
                      • iti bhima svarga

                  Metadata of the Edition

                  • Title: The Bhīma Svarga
                  • Text Identifier: DHARMA_CritEdBhimaSvarga
                  • Edited by Aditia Gunawan
                  • Copyright © 2019-2025 by Aditia Gunawan.

                  This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

                  .1

                  oṁ avighnam astu(1).

                  .2

                  hana(2) sira brahmana(3) ṛṣi māvak siddha(4) tan pahiṅan gәṅnikaṅ(5) mahātmanira vәkasniṅ siddha(6) vākbraja(7) tumus(8) tәkeṅ(9) kulasantānanira(10) kapva(11) śūraśāstra(12) tan hana kapuṅguṅira(13) riṅ sarvaśāstra kasrana(14) cakṣuh, virati(15) tan hana(16) haji huvus varaha(17) ri(18) sira apan(19) sampun(20) pakṣa(21) tānugraha(22) bhaṭāra gītapati(23) sevu(24) panonira(25) tumoniṅ(26) haji kabeh(27) ya(28) mataṅyan(29) hәnti(30) kvehniṅ(31) haji ri dalәm ri aṇḍabhuvana(32).

                  Parallels
                    tan hana kapuṅguṅira riṅ sarvaśāstra
                  • Sl38.4 tan hana kapuṅguṅira riṅ sarvatattva.

                  .3

                  jāhnavī(33), kadi(34) hiliniṅ(35) jāhnavī(36) vijilnikaṅ(37) grasta(38) sakeṅ(39) tutuknira(40) sira ta(41) pinakajagatpatiniṅ jagat(42) mvaṅ(43) pinakasuluhniṅ(44) bhuvana(45).

                  Parallels
                  • BhP37 kadi hiliniṅ jahnavi kahidәpanya.

                  .4

                  sahasrakiraṇa(46) ika kadyaṅganiṅ(47) bhuvana(48)B:1v tan hana kalintaṅan(49) paḍa(50) kasuluhan(51) deniṅ teja saṅ hyaṅ(52) sahasrarena(53) maṅkana tikaṅ(54) haji(55) kabeh tan(56) hana(57) kasiṅgahan(58) denira(59) lumah(60) kṛtinira(61) ri bhuvana(62) sakasahaban(63) deniṅ(64) ākāśa(65) mvaṅ pṛthivīmaṇḍala(66) deniṅ(67) kamahātmānira(68) riṅ(69) saṅ hyaṅ śāstra(70) tan kәneṅ ucap luput(71) ginuṇita(72) ika kavidagdhanira(73) daśajihvā(74) saptahasta(75) aṅiya n(76) palidaha(77) sapuluh(78) mapitu n(79) patuvuha(80) gumәlarana(81).

                  Parallels
                    sakasahaban deniṅ ākāśa
                  • BhP172.14: sakasahaban deniṅ ākāśa, ya tika deśa vәṅyanira.

                  .5

                  aḍoh(82) bhīma(83) mati si yama(84) yen(85) kva(86) vruh iṅ bapamu(87) mataṅen(88) guruaniṅ(89) sakadevatān kabeh tan bhasmībhūtaa(90).

                  .6

                  sapa arane(91) bapamu(92).

                  .7

                  pun pāṇḍu(93).

                  .8

                  sapa(94) babumu(95).

                  .9

                  pun kuntī(96).B:2r

                  .10

                  aḍoh(97) bhīma(98) mayan ta(99) kva(100) salah hiḍәp(101) aṅucap(102) haji(103) aṅucap(104) tattvaniṅ(105) dadi әndi(106) uṅgvanmu(107) vruha ri(108) panone(109) kamiA:2v tatā(110) saṅ hyaṅ(111) tattva dharma(112) mantaṅen(113) demu aṅucap(114) bapamu(115) si pāṇḍu(116) ibunta si kuntī(117) tan vruh kva(118) yen panilihanmu(119) talaga(120) pañcuran(121) mārgamu(122) gumәlar(123) riṅ jagat kaṅ iku(124).

                  .11

                  aḍoh(125) mara talaga pañcurane(126) ujarta(127) dak sәṅguh(128) tan māraṇaa(129) guru i rehku(130) antyanta(131) ujarta(132) marujar(133) aku bhaṭāra(134) aku abәcik(135) yen(136) binәcikan(137) ahala(138) duk iṅalan(139) dak varah ta kita bhaṭāra pa araniṅ(140) apaḍaṅ(141) du(142) araniṅ(143) ākāśa(144) sira ta kaṅ ṅaran(145)A:3r saṅ hyaṅ(146) jātinityākṣa(147) ku(148) pva araniṅ buntut(149) ti(150)B:2v araniṅ pṛthivī(151) sira ta(152) saṅ hyaṅ(153) asthitijātipralīna(154) ṅaranira tan maṅkana rika guru(155).

                  Parallels
                    amumuṅguṅ kita
                  • Kor86.29 apuṅguṅ pva kita.
                    aku abәcik yen binәcikan ahala duk iṅalan
                  • Kor86.30 ala yan iṅalan bәcik yan binәcikan.

                  .12

                  tuhu bhīma(156) sapa manih arane(157) bapanta bhīma(158).

                  .13

                  saṅ hyaṅ taya(159) saṅ hyaṅ veya vāhya(160) saṅ hyaṅ ila-ila(161) saṅ hyaṅ raja panulah.

                  .14

                  arani kabeh(162) bhīma(163) bapanta.

                  .15

                  saṅ hyaṅ(164) caduśakti(165) saṅ hyaṅ nirāvaraṇa(166) saṅ hyaṅ nīlaśikhaṇḍa(167) saṅ hyaṅ astithijātiprālina(168) saṅ hyaṅ nirupadrava(169).

                  .16

                  bhīma(170) manava tan kadi(171) aku bapanta(172), vәnaṅ aku(173) aṅavak(174) lәmah, acalagati avak gunuṅ, ajalәm avak bañu, āgneyatrimūrti(175) avak apuy, abāyu(176) sira(177) avak(178) aṅin, asuryyatrimutri asūryatrimūrti(179) avak(180) sraṅeṅe(181), aśaśāṅkatrimūrti(182) avak(183) vulan.

                  .17

                  ṅuniveh(184) dūradarśana(185), dūrākarṇana(186), dūrasarvajñāna(187), trus panone(188) riṅ(189) jagat, vәnaṅ(190) ambaramārga(191), adṛśyacāra(192) sakilan(193) sakiṅ(194) lәmah(195), aṅgaganacāra(196) saḍәpa(197) sakiṅ pṛthivī(198), amādapātapakan(199) pucukiṅ(200) kayu, ajalatuṇḍātapakan(201) megha(202), adarśanātapakan(203) aṅin, vәnaṅa bapamu(204) amor i(205) devatā(206) tan patiṅgal(207) rāga ri madhyapaA:4rda.

                  Parallels
                    amādapātapakan ... aṅin
                  • Kor34.11 vruh maveṣa-suruyana, vruh majalatuṇḍa, vruh mamādapa, vruh madarśana, vruh masuraveyan, vruh majalāntara, maṅkana kauttaman bhagavān kaki ṅhulun.

                  .18

                  aḍoh(208) aṅambara(209) inucapta(210) bhaṭāra(211) guru, apan iku(212) kasiddhaniṅ(213) guru(214) agugujәṅan(215), mānuṣa(216)Q:1v hana(217) kumavaśākәn(218).

                  .19

                  bhīma nora(219).

                  .20

                  hana(220) guru, paran(221) ta nimittaniṅ(222) sinaṅguh nora, apan kita(223) adūm āsana(224) riṅ mānuṣa(225), ikaṅ(226) amaṅunakәn(227) tapa, yan olih sa yuga(228), luput iṅ ṅel(229) lavan ṅәlih(230), olih roṅ yuga(231), tan kāndәlan(232)B:3v lara roga(233), olih(234) tәluṅ yuga(235), luput iṅ(236) tuha(237) pati, olih(238) pataṅ(239) yuga, vәnaṅ(240) mati(241) vәnaṅ(242) ahurip(243), olih(244) limaṅ yuga, trus panone riṅ(245) jagat(246), olih nәm(247) yuga, aḍaṅan(248) avake(249) kadi pusuh(250), gәnәp(251) pituṅ(252) yuga, vәnaṅ(253) ambaramārga(254), amor(255) iṅ(256) devatā(257), tan patiṅgal(258) rāga(259) riṅ(260) madhyapada(261), paran ta nimittane(263) tan hana mānuṣa(264) kumavaśākәn(265)(262).

                  .21

                  pun pāṇḍu(266) ta antyanta(267) mūḍhanipun(268), rare satәpak(269) upamānipun(270), byakta(271) amati(272) tan vruh iṅ(273) mārga paranipun(274), amaṅgih(275) svarga(276).

                  .22

                  guru әndi(277) pva(278) kaṅ(279) ujar maṅkana(280), hana(281) vvaṅ(282) atuha(283) mūḍha(284), kalaṅan(285) deniṅ(286) anakṣatra(287), katәvasanipun(288) anak-anak(289) rājaputra(290) śakti(291) vani(292), añakravati(293) kaśaktin(294) śaśāṅka(295) bhūmi(296) prakāśa(297) śūra(298) dhāraṇa(299), aṅәnani(300) prajurit(301), kaliṅane(302), śaśāṅka(303) riṅ(304) saṅ(305) hyaṅ(306) vulan(307), bhūmi(308) riṅ lәmah(309), prakāśa(310) riṅ(311) prajurit(312), śūra riṅ(313) vani(314), dhāraṇa(315) riṅ(316) kīrtikatri (317), aṅәne(318) riṅ(319) anukhaniṅ(320) jagat, kanimittane(321) aku(322) ahavana(323) kaśūran(324), kavaninku(325) riṅ jagat(326), kaliṅane(327), aku(328) prasiddha(329) aṅәntasakәna(330) prasiddha(331) anduṅkapa(332) svarga(333) bapaṅku(334).

                  .23

                  aja(335) bhīma(336), kaliṅane(337) kva(338) aharәp(339)Q:2v amaḍa(340) alavan(341) aku(342), apa kaliṅane(343) śabdamu(344), esi ujarmu(345), vvaṅ(346) atuha(347) mūḍha(348) kalaṅan(349) deniṅ(350) anakṣatra(351), eh(352) bhīma(353) kadi(354) aku(355) guṇāmu(356), yen(357) kva(358) harәp(359) gurua riṅ(360) sakadevatān(361), mah(362) pustaka(363) vaca(364) demu(365), hәnti(366) pva(367) demu(368) amaca(369) kaṅ iku(370), apaṅanti(371) riṅ(372) svarga(373) bapamu(374).

                  Parallels
                    aharәp amaḍa alavan
                  • la leçon de Q est harәp haṅәntasakna bapantā, harәp kitā hamalavan āku.

                  .24

                  rәp(375)B:4v sinaṇḍuṅ(376) kaṅ(377) pustaka(378).

                  .25

                  tan(379) vruh(380) aku amaca(381) guru(382).

                  .26

                  aḍoh(383) bhīma(384), kapūhan aku(385) demu(386) saṇḍuṅ(387) kaṅ(388) pustaka(389), tan(390) kataman(391) lara roga(392), upadrava(393) demu(394), śapatha kaṅ pustaka(395), apan(396) iku(397) saṅ hyaṅ(398) dharma(399) isinira(400) kabeh(401), hana(402) upamā(403), hana(404) parākrama(405), hana(406) śloka(407), hana(408) vākya(409), hana(410) āgama(411), hana(412) adhigama(413), hana(414) laghiman(415), hana prāpti(416) prākāmya(417), hana(418) vaśitva(419), hana(420) prabhutva(421), vyākaraṇa(422), prakaraṇa(423), kajyotiṣan(424), kuṭāramānava(425), sārasamuccaya(426).

                  • BhP146.14 tan katamana lara vighna.

                  .27

                  dak(427) varah ta kita(428) bhīma(429), yen haji(430) saṅ hyaṅ upavākya(431), ṅgonanika(432), kveh kari(433) kaṅ(434) den(435) aṅgo(436), apәl-apәl(437), halu-halu(438), hana prabhāva(439), hana(440) śaṅkhapāṇi(441), śivāgama(442), tattvāgama(443), saṅ hyaṅ vva vuṅa vari(444), śrīmaṅgala(445), tattvamaṅgala(446), muktimaṅgala(447), caturmareda(448), daśaśīla(449), putus pamutus(450), daśagītavāṇi(451), kәlәm vatu(452), karas kirab(453), māyāpati(454), lavan patipati(455), kaṅ kinalәvihakәn kabeh(456) deniṅ andadi janma(457), nimittaniṅ janma(458) tutug(459) tәkeṅ(460) pūrva(461), dakṣiṇa(462), pacima(463), uttara(464), madhya(465), gәneya(466), nairṛti(467), bāyabya(468), eśānya(469), saṅ hyaṅ dharma(470) den patyakna(471), ñumana(472) makapayuṅniṅ kapanasan(473), makatәkәniṅ(474) amaṅun hayu(475), kaṅ(476) pustaka(477) irәṅ(478) iku(479).

                  .28

                  guru(480) mәne(481) dak atakon(482) iri kita(483), paran rika(484) kamūlaniṅ(485) pustaka(486) irәṅ(487) iku(488), mantaṅen(489) sinaṅguh(490) lәvih(491), paran kaṅ ginave(492).

                  .29

                  bhīma(493) dak varah ta kita(494), mūlaniṅ pustaka hirәṅ(495), roniṅ gәbaṅ(496), pinukah(497) pinaḍa-paḍa(498) lvane lavan davane(499), tinitisan(500) gaṅgā(501) vīra(502) tanu(503), gaṅgā riṅ bañu(504), vīra riṅ panuli, tanu riṅ maṅsi(505).

                  Parallels
                    roniṅ gәbaṅ, pinukah ... tanu riṅ maṅsi
                  • SMG3 tipuk divasa pupus gәbaṅ lavan lvantar, tinut pinada-pada, lvane lavan davane, tinitisan asta gaṅga vira tanu, apa ta sinaṅguh asta gaṅga vira tanu, asta ṅaraniṅ taṅan, gaṅga ṅaraniṅ bañu, vira ta ṅaraniṅ panurat lavan panuli, tanu ṅaraniṅ maṅsi.

                  .30

                  paran ta kaṅ(506) ginave maṅsi(507) iku guru(508).

                  .31

                  kukusiṅ(509) lәṅa dilah(510), ghināṣa(511) riṅ lavak(512) tambaga(513), jineran(514) laṇḍaniṅ(515) kәpuh(516), vinoran(517) lāka(518), iṅuliṅ(519) iṅәnah(520) riṅ pamaṅsen(521), ya ta(522) maṅsi(523) arane(524), ikaṅ(525) ta prasiddha(526) ṅgvaniṅ(527) agave(528) pustaka(529).

                  .37

                  aku(541) bhīma(542), dak sәṅguh(543) si tan mānuṣa(544).

                  .38

                  mānuṣa uga(545) kaṅ(546) agave(547), kaliṅane(548) mijil(549) sakeṅ(550) ajñāna aṅәn-aṅәn(551), vәtuniṅ akṣara(552),B:6r ya(553) nimittaniṅ(554) hana(555) ujar(556) maṅkana(557), śarīra(558) rovaṅiṅ(559) vāk vidyājnāna(560), śarīra rovaṅta(561), viyanda vido moktya, akәcap(562) vṛddhi vicakṣaṇanira(563), kaliṅane(564) śarīra(565) juga rovaṅniṅ(566) vidagdha(567), aṅәn-aṅәn(568) pinaro(569) pinatәlu(570), agave(571) āgama(572), adhigama(573), pitovin(574) pustaka(575), dak sәṅguh(576) si mәtu(577) sapa sakeṅ(578) śūnya(579) amarṇa(580) avaknya(581), jәg(582) sakiṅ ākāśa(583), bәl(584) sakiṅ pṛthivī(585), amarṇa(586) avaknya(587), vinaliṅku(588) vvaṅ kaṅ(589) mānuṣa(590), aḍoh(591) anom(592) sapaṅavruhta(593) guru, amintuhu(594) varah riṅ(595) putrānom(596), maṅke ta pājarakәna(597) i rehku(598), adhidrava samāhita(599), kamokṣajñāna(600), kadi(601) vyakti(602) teka(603), kaliṅanya, ya ta(604) kaṅ anapaka riṅ(605) prāya(606), athavi(607) bhuvana maṅkana(608), ya teka(609) pājarakәna(610) i rehku(611). pinājarakәn(612) pva kaṅ tan atītanāgatabhāva(613) pustaka(614) pinintuhunta(615). maṅke(616) pājarakәna(617) riṅ śabda(618) kaṅ sinaṅguh(619) pustakajāti(620).

                  .39

                  bhīma(621) pājarakәna(622) kaṅ sinaṅguh(623) pustakajāti(624), kita yan vruha(625), iku sadriya(626) ñumana(627) paradene kita tan vruh(628).

                  .40

                  dak varah ta kita guru(629), kaṅ sinaṅguh(630) pustakajāti(631), apan(632) taliniṅ(633) bhuvana(634), yeka(635) sinaṅguh(636)Q:4r pustaka(637), kaliṅane(638) śarīra(639) juga(640) pustakajāti(641), kaṅ lәvih mәtu iki maṅke(642), śabda tuhu(643) pinakataliniṅ buddhi(644), lah dudū rika(645).

                  .52

                  .53

                  atūt(728) iku(729) bhīma(730), amacaa(731) pva(732) ganaleṅ(733) agagaman(734) maṅsi(735) bhīma(736), apa pva(737) bhīma(738).

                  .54

                  sūkṣmane(739) ta vacane(740).

                  .55

                  sūkṣmane(741) apa(742) bhīma(743).

                  .56

                  kukuse ta vacane(744).

                  .57

                  moṅkono(745) bhīma(746), lah vaca(747) dak ruṅvakna(748).

                  .58

                  yen dak avacane(749), ka kha ga gha ṅa(750), putih kukusira, ca cha ja jha ña(751), abaṅ(752) kukusira, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa(753), hirәṅ(754) kukusira(755), tata ta tha da dha na(756), kuniṅ(757) kukusira, pa pha ba bha ma(758), sivah(759) kukusira(760), ya ra la va(761), apiṇḍa goñjoṅ(762) kukusira, śa ṣa sa ha(763) birū kukusira(764), dudū rika guru(765).

                  .59

                  tuhu bhīma(766), vәnaṅa ta kva(767) aṅlәbur(768) pustaka(769).

                  .60

                  aṅapa ta dumeh(770) tan vәnaṅa, apan aku vruh mūlaniṅ(771) akṣara(772), apan hana(773) ri śarīraṅku(774) kabeh(775).

                  .61

                  lah tatā(776) yen tuhu śāstra(777)B:8r hana(778) ri(779) śarīranta(780), kami(781) aruṅvakәna(782) bhīma(783).

                  .62

                  lah(784) guru(785), aṅuṅkabiṅ(786) pustaka(787), hana riṅ atiṅku(788), analeniṅ(789) pustaka(790) hana riṅ taṅanku(791), mantraniṅ amaca(792) pustaka(793), yen aku amamaca(794).

                  .63

                  oṁ hana maṇik sakalapa(795), murub(796) aṅabar-abar(797), teja(798) varṇani(799) ṅhulun(800), vaṅkava(801) avak(802) i ṅhulun(803), apan(804) aku(805) saṅ hyaṅ(806) maṇik(807) anavarata(808).

                  .64

                  oṁ ila-ila(809) tan hana(810), ḍәṅәn(811) tan hana(812), bhūta-bhūta(813) tan hana, bapa ibuṅku tan hana(814), sānaku(815) tan hana kabeh(816).

                  .67

                  manih bhīma(829).

                  .68

                  Parallels
                    kaṅ asәdahan pustaka, saṅ hyaṅ bhagavān citragotra
                  • Kor112.30 bhagavān tambrapeṭa maṅgәlarakәn iṅ bhuvana, bhagavān citragotra pva masәḍahan pustaka.

                  nirbhūmi(1825), nirjalam(1826), nirbāpi(1827)}, nirteja(1828), nircamārutah(1829), nirdyugatah(1830), kaliṅanya, nirbhūmi tan hana lәmah(1831), nirjalam tan hana bañu(1832), nirbāpi tan hanāgni(1833), nirteja tan hana teja(1834), nirsūrya tan hana āditya(1835), nircandra tan hana vulan(1836), nirmāruta tan hana aṅin(1837), nirrūpa tan hana varṇa(1838), avaṅ-avaṅ uvuṅ-uvuṅ(1839), pәtәṅ hirәṅ(1840), śūnya tan hana(1841), noreṅ lor kidul vetan kulon(1842), noreṅ sor noreṅ ruhur(1843), saṅ hyaṅ lәṅis aranira(1844), sira ta malәṅis ya avaknira(1845), atutur ta sira, saṅ hyaṅ meṅәt ta aranira(1846), sira ta dadyakәn śarīranira(1847).

                  sapa pva hana samana(1848).

                  .279

                  hana bāyu lakṣaṇaṅku(1849), maṅәmpәl pva kaṅ(1850) bāyu śabda hiḍәp(1851), maśarīra ta avake(1852), sarva hana paśarīran(1853) saṅ hyaṅ bāyu(1854), satus saṅ hyaṅ paśarīranku(1855) ta ya pinakalakṣaṇaṅku(1856), lәkasku, polahku(1857), ambәku, śabdaku(1858), brataṅku(1859), pūjāku, gәlarku(1860), aranku saṅ hyaṅ ananta viśeṣa(1861).

                  .280

                  apasaṅtabe mānuṣanta(1862), ṅoṅ atutur i kamūlanta(1863), hana bāyu maṅәmpәl(1864) savijiniṅ savi gәṅira(1865), murub akṛta kṛta(1866), tan hana sinuluhan iṅ jagat(1867), sira ta kaṅ aranan(1868) bhaṭāra hyaṅ pramāṇa jātinityākṣa(1869), kapiṅroṅnira marūpa(1870), sajaguṅ gәṅira(1871), kadi ṅūni rūpanira(1872), sira ta inaranan saṅ hyaṅ caturdhanada(1873), kapiṅtiganira marūpa(1874), molah tan pāmbәkan(1875), acaṅkәm tan paṅucap(1876), ata ataṅan tan lumimbe(1877), asuku tan lumaku(1878), sira ta kaṅaran(1879) bhaṭāra tan paaran(1880), tiniṅhalanira kaṅ jagat tan hana(1881), sira ta saṅ hyaṅ mәnәṅ(1882), saṅ amet pinet(1883), amet suluhiṅ mata(1884) sakacaṅ ijo(1885), pinilәr dadi sapulu(1886), pinijәt dadi rәmpuk(1887), tinibakәn dadi sabatamiriṅ(1888), inidәkan dadi sarimbag(1889), pinalidәr dadi sasvaṅ(1890) riṅ aṇḍabhuvana(1891), dadi sacakraniṅ padāti(1892), sira ta kaṅ anikut bhuvana(1893), sira saṅ amindu bhuvana(1894), sira aran ki huvus ki pahuvusan(1895).

                  .281

                  arәp pva kaṅ pṛthivī(1896), aṅaṅәn-aṅәn hayvan i pṛthivī(1897), aṅusap mata piṅtiga(1898), mәtu kaṅ luh adrәs(1899), tumiba riṅ pṛthivī(1900), mәtu ta tīrtha(1901), samana ta sira(1902) iṅaranan hyaṅ gambhīra(1903), maṅampir aṅaṅәn-aṅәn(1904), mata tәṅәn pinәlәsatakәn(1905), dadi āditya(1906), mata kiva pinәlәsatakәn(1907) dadi vulan(1908), kapanasan pva sira deniṅ yuganira(1909), akukuḍuṅ ta sira(1910), samana ta sira inaranan saṅ hyaṅ kumbha(1911), mojar ta aranira(1912), umā tan adoh(1913), gumәlar kaṅ jagat kabeh(1914), tan hana vәṅi(1915), tan hana paḍaṅ anaravaṅ(1916) kaṅ rāt samana(1917), haneṅ svarga(1918), kapva haneṅ śūnya paramaśūnya(1919), hananiṅ aṇuh paramāṇuh(1920), hana ta paṅadәgan(1921) saṅ hyaṅ śivāditya(1922), sira ta aran bhaṭāra yaṅ vidhi(1923), bhaṭāra yaṅ ananta viśeṣa(1924), bhaṭāra yaṅ ananta viśeṣa pva sira ayuga, mijil saṅ hyaṅ meṅәt(1925) ayuga pva saṅ hyaṅ meṅәt(1926), mijil ta saṅ hyaṅ asthitijāti(1927), ayuga pva saṅ hyaṅ asthitijāti(1928), mijil ta saṅ hyaṅ sūkṣma(1929), ayuga pva saṅ hyaṅ sūkṣma(1930), mijil ta saṅ hyaṅ niravayava(1931), ayuga saṅ hyaṅ niravayava(1932), mijil ta saṅ hyaṅ ananta viśeṣa(1933), ayuga saṅ hyaṅ ananta viśeṣa(1934), mijil ta saṅ hyaṅ viśeṣa(1935), sakiṅ kadalīpuṣpa mārganira(1936), ayuga saṅ viśeṣa(1937), mijil ta saṅ hyaṅ pramāṇa viśeṣa(1938), sakiṅ cupu maṇik havanira(1939), ayuga saṅ hyaṅ pramāṇa viśeṣa(1940), mijil ta saṅ hyaṅ tuṅgal-tuṅgal(1941), sakiṅ liṅga baṅ varṇa mārganira(1942), ayuga saṅ hyaṅ tuṅgal-tuṅgal(1943), mijil ta sira kapat(1944) saṅ hyaṅ aṅәn(1945), pva muvah saṅ hyaṅ tuṅgal(1953), mijil ta kita bhaṭāra guru(1954), sakeṅ kumbha maṇik mārganta(1955), ayuga pva kita devatā(1956), bhaṭāra guru(1957), mәtu taṅ īśvara(1958), brahmā, mahādeva(1960), viṣṇu, maheśvara(1961), rudra, śaṅkara, śambhu(1962)(1959).

                  .282

                  bhaṭāra īśvara(1963), devīnira bhaṭārī sarasvatī(1964), bhaṭāra maheśvara(1965) devīnira bhaṭārī maheśvarī(1966), bhaṭāra brahmā(1967) devīnira bhaṭārī pramāṇadevī(1968), bhaṭāra rudra(1969), devīnira bhaṭārī rājalakṣmī(1970)B:24v, bhaṭāra mahādeva(1971), devīnira bhaṭārī mahādevī(1972), bhaṭāra śaṅkara(1973), devīnira bhaṭārī śaṅkarī(1974), bhaṭāra viṣṇu, devīnira bhaṭāri śrī(1975), bhaṭāra śambhu, devīnira bhaṭārī varāhī(1976), kapaṅgih śiva ri madhya(1977), mәtu sadā eka, aṅәbәk iṅ jagat kabeh(1978).

                  .283

                  kabeh aku vruh guru(1979), ayuga bhaṭāra viṣṇu(1980), mijil bhaṭārī pṛthivī(1981), mayuga bhaṭārī pṛthivī(1982), mijil bhaṭārī yaṅ antarī(1983), ayuga bhaṭārī yaṅ antarī(1984), mijil bhaṭārī gaṅgī(1985), apan iku yuga yinugakәn(1986), aku ayuga tan yinuga(1987), agave tan ginave(1988), hana tan pasihanakәn(1989), apan aku pakumpulaniṅ bāyu śabda hiḍәp(1990), aku ta kaṅaran saṅ hyaṅ anta viśeṣa(1991), apan sānaku saṅ hyaṅ viśeṣa(1992),B:25r putuṅku saṅ hyaṅ pramāṇa viśeṣa(1993), buyutku saṅ hyaṅ tuṅgal-tuṅgal(1994), pituṅku apa(1995), saṅ kita bhaṭāra guru(1996), aku viśeṣa kabeh(1997), apan aku avakiṅ bāyu viśeṣa(1998), aku huripiṅ rāt kabeh(1999), kabeh kita bhaṭāra viniśeṣa(2000) deniṅ bāyu(2001), kita bhaṭāra padene(2002) tan vruh i rehku(2003), apaniṅ bhaṭāra vruh tan vinarah(2004), kita pva tan vaspada(2005) tumiṅhal i rehku(2006), guru, kita tәdas panonta ri jagat(2007), harәp pva sira vaspadaa(2008).

                  rәp dah(2009).

                  .285

                  sira vәkasiṅ tinon(2010), sira tәkeṅ don(2011), sira vәkasiṅ pinet(2012), vәkasiṅ amet pinet(2013), irika bhaṭāra madūm vipatha(2014), sira ta ayuga(2015) bhaṭāra parameśvara(2016), bhaṭāra parameśvara(2017), tan payuga(2018)B:25v, sakvehniṅ navadevatā kabeh(2019), samana ta sira inaranan bhaṭāra guru(2020), kalihan pva kita ayuga(2021) tinampel punta kita pitәlu(2022), amәtvakәn kanyā hayu(2023), bhaṭārī umā aranira(2024), lanaṅ tan lanaṅ, vadon tar vadon(2025), antyanta listuhayunira(2026), harṣa pva kita saṅgamaa(2027), tan vihaṅ bhaṭārī umā(2028), paksanta saṅgamaa(2029), katiṅhalan ta carat bhaṭārī(2030), kagyat ta kita samana(2031), tinugәlan pva kaṅ carat(2032), ya ta hana carat iṅ tahun(2033), tumiba ri pṛthivī(2034), ya ta hana carat iṅ lәmah(2035), mәtu pva kaṅ gәtih itәm(2036), ya ta kāraṇaniṅ hana kәbo(2037), iṅusapan pva kaṅ gәtih(2038), ya ta kāraṇaniṅ hana sapi(2039), pinagavekәn leṅ(2040), ya ta kāraṇaniṅ hana celeṅ(2041), vinasuhan kaṅ leṅ(2042), ya ta kāraṇanira hana asu(2043), varas irikā abәbәk i leṅ(2044), ya ta kāraṇaniṅ hana bebek(2045), mәtu kulit hayam(2046), ya ta kāraṇaniṅ hana hayam(2047), kasilir pva riṅ aṅin(2048), ya ta kāraṇaniṅ hana manuk(2049).

                  .286

                  hana rudhira aṅambәk-ambәk(2050), ahәnәṅ śarīra(2051), sira ta saṅ hyaṅ śaśaru\-dhi\-ra aranira(2052), hana ta kali rudhira(2053), ahәnәṅ aku muṅguh riṅ dodot(2054), sira ta inaranan(2055) bhaṭāra samaguru aranira(2056), aṅher pva sireṅ uṇḍuhaniṅ ati(2057), samana ta sira duk iṅaranan(2058) saṅ hyaṅ pañcaśiva aranira(2059), aṅher pva sireṅ ototiṅ ati(2060), samana duk iṅaranan(2061) saṅ hyaṅ śabdaśiva(2062), aṅher pva sira riṅ tuṅtuṅiṅ ati(2063), samana ta sira inaranan(2064) saṅ hyaṅ sūkṣmaśiva(2065), sira ta bhaṭāra yaṅ tan paguru aranira(2066), tan maṅkana rika guru(2067).

                  .292

                  aja bhīma(2087) nora hana deva liñok(2088), apan ujarku ri ṅuni(2089), yen aku alah(2090), gantenana luṅguh deni bapanta(2091), aja dak varah ta kita(2092), riṅ śabda vәnaṅ liñok(2093) lilima kvehnya(2094), tan pasakapaṅgih ri pañcānṛta(2095), ujariṅ amet patyani musuh(2096) vәnaṅ liñok(2097), harәp arabi hayu vәnaṅ liñok(2098), riṅ amet ahurip vәnaṅ liñok(2099),A:33r riṅ arәpa sugiha vәnaṅ liñok(2100), luṅhaniṅ dodolan vәnaṅ liñok(2101), tan pāpa ika kabeh(2102), moṅkono bhīma(2103).

                  Parallels
                    riṅ śabda vәnaṅ liñok ... tan pāpa ika kabeh
                  • Sl22.1 lima ikaṅ tan amuhara pāpa niṅ lәñok lvirnya kavruhana, ujariṅ sivo mapacәh-pacәhan, karakṣahaniṅ hurip, karakṣahaniṅ dṛvya, karakṣahaniṅ anak rabi muvah ri sәḍәṅ iṅ pasaṅgaman.

                  .294

                  hamamaḍa A hamamada BC                  adhikāra si bhīma ... amamaḍa deva
                  la leçon de Q est très différente dans ce passage: ah manavā dudu yan āna paribhiṣanmu bhīma, dumeh ikaṅ rat, tan pasaṅgar, tan pabantәn, kena pva den tiru, ikaṅ manuṣā tan ana mumūjā, tan pabraṭā, tan pabantәn, tan bhakti riṅ devā, havake den idәp deva, tāhali-hali hade, hamiṣaya, adoh bhīma, hapan kita idәp marā bhaṭāra dentā tinonyaṅ, hanulu cumbu bhīma, harәp āḍana devata.                  guruABC
                  eh guru Q                  taABC
                  pva Q                  paran dumehAB

                  habantәn ABhabakti Chababantәn Q                  kaṅ vruhaA
                  kavruha Bkavruhiṅ Cyaṅ kaṅ vruh Q                  ri kitaBC
                  riṅ kita AQ                  paran katәmvaniṅAB
                  paran katәmvaniṅ paka 4+ Capan si kaṅ Q                  ujar maṅkanaA

                  dumeh B2+vvah Cdumeh Q                  asraṅ amet norm.
                  hasraṅ amet ABhasri hamet Chagriṅ amet Q                  dharma lәvih norm.
                  ḍar lәvih Adarma lәvih Bdarma kaṅ alәvih Cḍarmma lәvih Q                  kaṅ mānuṣa norm.
                  kaṅ manusa ABom. QC                  harәp avaśa norm.
                  ha°rha°ṛpavasa Aacharә havasa Apcharәpra Bharәp pavasah Charәp Q                  vruh iri kitaAB
                  hasriha ri kita Criṅ kita Q                  ṅuniveh vruhaB
                  ṅunivehha Aṅuniveh yan vruh Cmaṅko mvaṅ ṅuni, harәp vruha Q                  saṅkaniṅ bhuvana norm.

                  hana po kaṅ Ahana pva ka Bhanaka Cana pva kaṅ Q                  tan vruhAQ

                  haranku samana Aom. BCharanmu samana: Q                  dumunuṅ tāku norm.

                  riṅ saṅ hyaṅ tulaṅan manik Aom. CBriṅ saṅ hyaṅ patulaṅan maṇik Q                  sapa aranmu samana norm.
                  sapa haranmu samana Asapa ta haranmu samana Bom. Csapa:ta haranmu samana: Q                  saṅ hyaṅ gәñjor maṇik nirmala norm.

                  pinakavakta kabeh Apinahkavakta kabeh Blac. C                  yen kita ... pinakāvakta kabeh
                  urip iṅ jambudipa saṅ hyaṅ ratnaśiva, rūpa kadi bañu muñcar, urip iṅ malayu saṅ hyaṅ ratnaviśākha, rūpa kadi bañu muṅguh iṅ rvan iṅ kamumu, urip iṅ vano kliṅ saṅ hyaṅ ratnahyaṅ, rūpa kadi raditya wahu mijil, urip iṅ bali saṅ hyaṅ ratnavindu, rūpa kadi nenetra bubur-buburan, urip iṅ tañjuṅpura saṅ hyaṅ ratnajīva, rūpa kadi nenetran intәn, urip iṅ nusa java saṅ hyaṅ madhyakusuma, rūpa kadi nenetran mirah.                  bhīma yen aku makatutupiṅ bhuvana norm.
                  bima yen tu makatutupiṅ bhuvaṇa Abima yena:ku makatutupi buvana Blac. C                  duk aku aṅher norm.
                  duk aku haṅer Aduka:ka ṅer Blac. C                  riṅ pūrva norm.
                  riṅ purva Ari purva Blac. C                  dakṣiṇa norm.
                  dakṣina Adaksina Blac. C                  pacima norm.

                  sira ta haran bhaṭāra yaṅ vdi Asara ta haran baṭāra yaṅ vidi Bsira ta haran batara yaṅ vidi C                  bhaṭāra yaṅ ananta viśeṣa norm.

                  batara yaṅ ananta visesa pva sira hayuga, mijil sa hya me1+ Com. AB                  ayuga pva saṅ hyaṅ meṅәtA

                  saṅ hyaṅ pañcaśiva saṅ hyaṅ pañcasivah ṅara:nira Asaṅ hya pañasivah ṅaranira Blac. Csaṅ hyaṅ pañca:viśeṣa: Q                  aṅher pva sireṅ ototiṅ ati norm.

                  taya kulon, taya lor taya kulvan, taya lvar Blac. Com. Q                  taya madhya norm.
                  tayeṅ madya Ataya madya Blac. Com. Q                  taya iṅ sor, taya luhur norm.
                  taya hiṅsor, taya:luhur Ataya hisvar, taya luhur Blac. Ctaya:riṅ soriṅ rehku, taya luhuriṅ sa:riranku Q                  vastu luputa riṅ kriyā upāya norm.
                  vastu luputa riṅ kriya hupaya Avastu luputiṅ kriya hupaya Blac. Cpavus aluput riṅ kiryya upaya Q                  luputa riṅ tujuAB
                  lac. Com. Q                  tulah tarañjana em.
                  tlah tarajña:na Atlu tarajña:na Blac. Com. Q                  luputa riṅ gave saṅ yama norm.
                  luputa riṅ gaveṅ saṅ yama A2+ tiṅ riṅ gave saṅ yama Blac. Cluputa riṅ pagave ṣamaya Q                  tan katūtūtan pañcākṣara norm.
                  tan katutun pañcaksara Atan katututan pañcaksara Blac. Criṅ pañca:kṣara Q                  padohaniṅ mahākāla norm.
                  padohaniṅ mahakala Apadvahaniṅ mahakala Blac. Com. Q                  sakvehaniṅ sarva hala norm.
                  sakvehaniṅ sarvva hala Asakvaehniṅ sarvva hala Blac. Csakvehiṅ sarvva:ṅaṅga Q                  tan tumameṅ śarīraṅku norm.
                  tan tumameṅ sariraku ABlac. Ctan kәna: Q                  oṁkāra namah śivāya norm.
                  oṁkara nama sivaya Aoṁkara namasihvaya Blac. Comka:ra na:ma śivaya: Q                  sa bā ta a ī norm.
                  sa ba ta a i Asa ba ta a iṅ Blac. Csa ba ta a i na:ma śivaya: Q

                  Apparatus


                  ^1. oṁ avighnam astu] norm., // Ø // oṁ avignam astuA, // ba // Ø - oṁ me // /// Ø oṁ avignәm astu nama sidәm Ø ØB, lac.C, oṁ avignamastuQ
                  ^2. hana] norm., anaAB, lac.C, om.Q
                  ^3. brahmana] norm., brāhmaṇaA, bramanaB, lac.C, om.Q
                  ^4. māvak siddha] norm., mavak ṣidḍaA, mavaka:sidanB, lac.C, om.Q

                  ^2101. luṅhaniṅ dodolan vәnaṅ liñok] norm., luṅhaniṅ dola:n vnaṅ liñokA, luṅaniṅ dvadvalan, vәnaṅ liñvakB, lac.C, luṅha yan kinol, vnaṅ liñokәnQ
                  ^2102. tan pāpa ika kabeh] norm., tan papa:hika kabehA, tan papa hila kabehB, lac.C, hnәṅaniṅ rare hanaṅis, i kita kabeh, tan pa:pa ikaQ
                  ^2103. moṅkono bhīma] norm., moṅno bimaA, mvakvanva bimaB, lac.C, moṅkono harane guruQ
                  ^2104. atūt iku guru] norm., hatut iku guruAB, lac.C, om.Q
                  ^2105. sukha si kami maṅko] norm., suka si kami maṅkoA, suka si kami maṅkvaB, lac.C, suka si maṅke hakuQ
                  ^2106. aṅruṅu ujarta] norm., haṅruṅu hujarbhaA, haruṅu hujartaB, lac.C, haṅruṅu hujar maṅkana:Q
                  ^2107. mayan ta kita bhīma] norm., mayan ta kita bimaA, mayan ta kitaB, lac.C, matan sinaṅguh pa:pa, yan iṅ dvapara:Q
                  ^2108. sinaṅguh mūḍha] norm., sinaṅguh mudaAB, lac.C, dak varah ta kita bhīmaQ
                  ^2109. ujariṅ para liñok pva ujariṅ] norm., hujariṅ para, liñok pva hujariṅA, hujar ri para liñvak pva hujariṅB, lac.C, liñok hujariṅQ
                  ^2110. avruhakәn tam bruh] em., amәruhakәn tam bruhA, avruhakan tam bruhB, lac.C, hamәruhakәn tan vruhQ
                  ^2111. maṅko ta paranta] norm., maṅko ta pa2+taA, maṅkva ta parantaB, lac.C, paranta:maṅkoQ
                  ^2112. kaharәpanta bhīma] norm., 4+ta bimaA, kaharәpanta bimaB, lac.C, karәpta:bhīmaQ
                  ^2113. guru dak palaku ri kita] B, guru ḍak palaku ri kitaA, lac.C, ḍak palaku riṅ kita guruQ
                  ^2114. svargane bapaṅku] Q, svargahaneṅ bapaṅkuA, sagarhaneṅ bapaṅkuB, lac.C
                  ^2115. lah bhīma yen maṅkana kaharәpta] norm., lah bima yen maṅ4+ptaA, lah bima yen makana kaharәptaB, lac.C, om.Q
                  ^2116. әndi ta ṅgvanane bapanta] norm., 1+di ta gvanane bapantaA, hәdi ta gvanane ri bapantaB, lac.C, om.Q
                  ^2117. guru riṅ āgneya] norm., guru ri gneyaA, guru riṅ agәneyaB, lac.C, riṅ a:gneyanQ
                  ^2118. uṅgvanane bapaṅku] norm., hugonane bapaṅkuA, hugvanane bapaṅkuB, lac.C, svarggan bapaṅkuQ
                  ^2119. bhīma norāna svarga tvaṅ] norm., bhīma norāna svarga tvaṅ, bima noran svarga tuvaṅA, bima nvarana svarga tuvaṅB, lac.C, bhīma nora:na svargga:tuhuQ
                  ^2120. guru ri pāntara arane] norm., guru ri pantarara ha2+A, guru ri pantara haraneB, lac.C, riṅ pantara:Q
                  ^2121. svargaane bapaṅku] norm., svar2+neṅ bapaṅkuA, svargahane bapakuB, lac.C, svargga:ne bapaṅkuQ
                  ^2122. bhīma norāna kadi kita] Q, bima norana kadi kitaA, bima nvarana kadi kitaB, lac.C
                  ^2123. aṅәntasakәn vvaṅ atuha] norm., haṅәntasakәn vvaṅ atuhaA, haṅәntasakәn vvaṅ atuvaB, lac.C, haṅәntasakәn voṅ atuva:Q
                  ^2124. lah bhīma ri kṛtasamayajātipāntara] norm., lah bhīma ri kṛtasamayajātipāntara, lah bima ri kutasamayajatipantaraA, lah bima ri kratasamayajatipantaraB, lac.C, lah riṅ kṛtta:samaja:tiQ
                  ^2125. aranane svargaane bapanta] norm., haranane svargahane bapantaA, aranane, svargahaneṅ bapantaB, lac.C, iku svargga:ne bapanta:bhīmaQ
                  ^2126. apan samayaku riṅ ṅuni lavan kita] norm., hapa1+ samayaku riṅ ṅuni lavan kitaA, hapan samayaku ri ṅuni lavan kitaB, lac.C, mapan sama:dyaṅku riṅ ṅuni lava:n kitaQ
                  ^2127. jātinta avarah, pāntarane ujarta] norm., jatin1+harehantarane hujartaA, jatinta havarah pantarane hujartaB, lac.C, ja:ti havarah hujar lava:n kita:Q

                  ^2144. әnahakna harәpiṅ pun pāṇḍu] norm., әnahakna harәpiṅ pun pāṇḍu, hnahakna harәpun panduA, hnaṅhakna harәp iṅ pun paduB, lac.C, gnahipun paṇduQ
